core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Gaming aesthetics
Emotion First: Evoke 'Wealth' and 'Future' through deep space vibes
Content is King: Data must be legible but beautiful
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make neon pop
Contrast: High-contrast text for readability against dark backgrounds
anti_patterns: No flat, solid colors for main backgrounds (use gradients/noise)
No center-aligned text blocks unless for dramatic effect

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Unbounded' for all H1-H3. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight 700 or 900.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all UI text. High legibility.
usage_rules.numbers: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for financial data, tickers, and hash IDs.
usage_rules.uppercase: Use uppercase with wide tracking (0.1em) for labels (e.g., 'ROI', 'LEVEL').

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12 for containers.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (4 cols). Dense, gap-4 or gap-6.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-violet-600 hover:from-blue-500 hover:to-violet-500 text-white shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(79,70,229,0.3)] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white rounded-full px-6 py-2 backdrop-blur-md transition-all

cards.glass: bg-gray-950/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-gray-900/50 border border-gray-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 transition-all

navigation.glass_header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-gray-950/70 backdrop-blur-lg border-b border-white/5

effects: Tracing Beam: Animated gradient borders on high-value cards
Noise Texture: Subtle grain overlay on backgrounds (opacity 0.03)
Glow Orbs: Blurred colored circles behind key elements

images.logo_placeholder: Use text 'MINEX' with Unbounded font, gradient Blue to Purple on the 'X'

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP THEME: Ensure tailwind.config.js has the custom colors (primary, background, etc.) defined.
3. CREATE LAYOUTS: Build a 'DashboardLayout' (Sidebar + Topbar) and a 'MarketingLayout' (Navbar + Footer).
4. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn components for all interactive elements (Dialogs, Dropdowns, Forms) but style them with the 'glass' utility classes.
5. ANIMATE: Use framer-motion for page transitions and card hover effects.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links.
7. MOCK DATA: Use the 'content_rules' to populate the UI with accurate data (tiers, ROI, etc.).
8. LOGO: Since the logo file is missing, create a typographic logo using 'Unbounded' font with a gradient span for the 'X'.
universal_guidelines: Do not use solid flat colors for backgrounds; use gradients or noise.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
Mobile responsiveness is critical - check grids on small screens.
